statements: UPDATE SustainabilityInitiative SET impact_reduction = 0.25 WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE SustainabilityInitiative SET strategy = 'Recycling Program', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE initiative_id = 2;

UPDATE SustainabilityInitiative SET initiative_name='Eco-Friendly Packaging', strategy='Reduce, Reuse, Recycle', start_date='2021-01-01', end_date='2022-01-01', impact_reduction=15.75 WHERE initiative_id=1

UPDATE SustainabilityInitiative SET strategy='Renewable Energy Sources', initiative_name='Green Energy Transition', start_date='2021-03-15', end_date='2023-03-15', impact_reduction=23.45 WHERE initiative_id=2
UPDATE strategy SET strategy_name='New Strategy Name', focus_area='Updated Focus Area' WHERE strategy_id=1;
UPDATE impact_measurement SET value=15.75, measurement_date='2022-02-15' WHERE strategy_id=2 AND metric_name='Conversion Rate';
UPDATE strategy SET end_date='2022-12-31', focus_area='Marketing' WHERE strategy_id=1001;
UPDATE impact_measurement SET value=75.5, measurement_date='2022-10-15' WHERE strategy_id=1002 AND metric_name='Revenue';
UPDATE sustainability_initiative SET total_cost = total_cost + 5000 WHERE initiative_id = '96a5f35c-9b3d-4dc3-a3b4-3e3c8aeb3f15';
UPDATE reduction_strategies SET implementation_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE strategy_id = '7004b6d7-af9a-4429-bb3d-b8bdc207570e';
UPDATE sustainability_initiative SET total_cost = 5000.50 WHERE initiative_id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11';
UPDATE environmental_impact SET impact_score = 8, impact_type = 'Water Conservation' WHERE initiative_id = 'b3b7c0a8-7d22-4a00-aa1d-72f0291e3b4b';
UPDATE Initiative SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE StrategyImplementation SET success = FALSE WHERE strategy_id = 2 AND initiative_id = 1
UPDATE Initiative SET description = 'Updated description', start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE StrategyImplementation SET success = true WHERE strategy_id = 2 AND initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE sustainability_initiative SET name = 'Green Initiatives', description = 'Promoting eco-friendly practices', start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE environmental_impact_metrics SET metric_value = 75.6 WHERE initiative_id = 1;
UPDATE sustainability_initiative SET name='Updated Initiative Name', description='Updated description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE environmental_impact_metrics SET metric_value=10.5 WHERE initiative_id=2;
